programme.title: Jack's Back
programme.desc: In a sickening coincidence -- or a sinister homage to actual crimes -- women are being murdered in Los Angeles 100 years after Jack the Ripper terrorized London. Police think John Westford (James Spader), a young doctor, is the murderer, and when he's found hanging from a noose, authorities believe his apparent suicide is a tacit admission of guilt. But his twin brother, Rick (also Spader), insists John was killed, and, when it appears Rick is right, the investigation takes a stunning turn.

programme.title: AE Apocalypse Earth

programme.title: Age of Tomorrow

Left with no other choice, Earth sends an elite military team of science and combat specialists through the portal where they attempt to stop the invasion from the inside out.

programme.title: Mega Shark vs Crocosaurus

programme.title: Wildest Islands

programme.title: Wildest Islands

programme.title: Wildest Islands

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre
programme.desc: When meteors fall in a curious V-formation and crash on a field in England, an alien force possesses several scientists and infects bystanders with a deadly disease.

programme.title: Sisters of Death
programme.desc: Five women involved in a fatal sorority initiation seven years earlier are stalked by a killer at their reunion.

programme.title: The Black Raven
programme.desc: One dark night, a fearsome rainstorm chases four people to a mysterious motel: a sneering gangster (Noel Madison), an embezzling bank teller (Byron Foulger) and a hopeful couple (Wanda McKay, Bob Randall) who are trying to elope. Shortly after the raging storm wipes out the surrounding roads, the trapped tourists begin to suspect that each of them -- even snooty caretaker Amos Bradford (George Zucco) -- harbors a dark secret. Before long, these discoveries promise money and lead to murder.

programme.title: Spooks Run Wild
programme.desc: The East Side Kids are sent to summer camp, and shortly after arriving they encounter a mysterious man named Nardo (Bela Lugosi). Naturally, the Kids assume Nardo is the "monster killer" they've been warned about. Their theory is strengthened when they see Peewee (David Gorcey), seemingly risen from the dead after getting shot, walking around Nardo's house in a zombie-like trance. The Kids take it upon themselves to capture Nardo before he can kill anyone else.

programme.title: The Devil's Daughter
programme.desc: A Jamaican (Nina Mae McKinney) uses voodoo to scare her New York sister (Ida James) off their father's rubber plantation.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Trailer for "Scared to Death" from 1980.

programme.title: Scared to Death
programme.desc: Dr. Josef Van Ee (George Zucco) runs a private mental institution where he and his son, Ward (Roland Varno), are keeping his daughter-in-law, Laura (Molly Lamont), against her will. Laura is convinced her husband is trying to scare her away from their marriage, while Ward assures her she needs the help he's offering. Things go from bad to worse when Van Ee's brother, the magician professor Leonide (Bela Lugosi), shows up with his dwarf partner, Indigo (Angelo Rossitto).

programme.title: The Bat
programme.desc: A killer called "the Bat" has claimed many lives in the small town inhabited by novelist Cornelia van Gorder (Agnes Moorehead) and her maid, Lizzie (Lenita Lane). As Cornelia implores Dr. Malcolm Wells (Vincent Price) to help her ailing maid, $1 million in the town's bank goes missing. With greed and fear reaching new heights, police Lt. Andy Anderson (Gavin Gordon) goes to Cornelia's house to investigate additional murders committed by the Bat.

programme.title: Robin Hood of the Pecos
programme.desc: A night rider (George "Gabby" Hayes) and his singing partner (Roy Rogers) send Texas carpetbaggers packing.

programme.title: Under Western Stars
programme.desc: A singing-cowboy congressman (Roy Rogers) goes to Washington to save ranchers from a power dam.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: A comet is out of control because a mad scientist pulled it closer in order to study it. The comet accelerates and the path leads to Earth.

programme.title: The New Three Stooges
programme.desc: A magic carpet saves the boys from an evil genie; Curly Joe finds a way to make food gathering easier; Emperor Caesar invents baseball and hires the Stooges to play against real lions.

programme.title: Betty Boop
programme.desc: Adventures of the animated bombshell.

programme.title: An Elephant Never Forgets
programme.desc: A classroom of animals misbehaves when the teacher leaves.

programme.title: Oliver Twist
programme.desc: Dickens' London waif (Dickie Moore) joins Fagin's (Irving Pichel) crime gang led by brutish Bill Sikes (William "Stage" Boyd) and the Artful Dodger.

programme.title: Tarzan's Revenge
programme.desc: Tarzan swings to the rescue when an evil African chieftain takes a beautiful safari member as his bride.

programme.title: American Empire
programme.desc: After the Civil War, friends Dan Taylor (Richard Dix) and Paxton Bryce (Preston Foster) yearn for new lives. While captaining a riverboat, the friends confront Creole cattle rustler Dominique Beauchard (Leo Carrillo). Learning of Beauchard's intent to cheat them, the men keep his cattle, and Paxton convinces Dan to turn to cattle ranching. Their ranch becomes successful, and Paxton eventually marries Dan's sister, Abby (Frances Gifford) -- but Beauchard soon returns to challenge them.

programme.title: The Mark of the Hawk
programme.desc: After attending school in England, Obam (Sidney Poitier) returns to his African homeland where he is elected to the legislative council. One of the only natives on the council, Obam soon finds himself caught in an impossible battle. On one side are the interests of the British colonists, on the other are those of his own people. It will take the help of Obam's wife, Renee (Eartha Kitt), and sympathetic missionary Bruce Craig (John McIntire) to keep the situation from boiling over.

programme.title: The Perils of Pauline
programme.desc: Pearl White (Betty Hutton), a beautiful but talentless sweatshop girl, wins a spot in a theater company run by Michael Farrington (John Lund), with whom she becomes involved. But after a dispute with Mike, Pearl quits, hoping to try her luck in movies. When a film director humiliates her best friend, however, Pearl wreaks havoc all over the studio lot. Surprisingly, Pearl's rampage earns her the lead in an upcoming silent action movie. Soon, Pearl is on a collision course with fame.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of Time
programme.desc: A time machine takes a scientist, his helpers (Anthony Eisley, Gigi Perreau) and a villain (Scott Brady) to the future, then to the Stone Age.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.desc: A magazine editor (Bert Convy) sends his girlfriend (Jane Seymour) undercover to get an inside story on pro football cheerleaders.

programme.title: All-American Co-ed
programme.desc: Fraternity brothers enter one (Johnny Downs) of their own in a beauty contest after a women's college insults them.

programme.title: Battle of the Worlds
programme.desc: A dedicated scientist is pitted against an unknown enemy from space when an armed meteor is sent to destroy Earth.

programme.title: The Stranger
programme.desc: Immediately following World War II, ex-Nazi Franz Kindler (Orson Welles) is living under a false identity as a teacher in a small Connecticut town, and has even married the headmaster's daughter (Loretta Young) as part of his cover. But when one of Kindler's old German associates (Konstantin Shayne) arrives unexpectedly in town, bringing in his wake a sly federal investigator (Edward G. Robinson), Kindler resorts to desperate measures to preserve his secret.

programme.desc: Tune in to hear Rob, Shawn & O'Neal chat with friend & legendary actor Tom Sizemore on this week's episode of The Cray. Tom is an actor and producer best known for his supporting roles in films such as Born on the Fourth of July, Natural Born Killers, Heat, Saving Private Ryan & Black Hawk Down - just to name a few. Take a trip back to the 90's as Tom shares stories and talks about his personal journey in the entertainment business. This double feature episode also includes a segment with guest DJ MOS, in which he talks about DJing during the pandemic and his career working in music.

programme.title: Uncut with Jay Cutler
programme.desc: Zach Miller, former NFL tight end, joins Jay to talk about his transition to singing and songwriting after he left his career in pro football, and how his wife immediately made fun of him for having to learn how to do vocal exercises. The guys also dive into Zach's start at Nebraska, how he developed into an NFL tight end, and how his first preseason game landed him on special teams for all the wrong reasons. Zach also tells the story about breaking his foot in Chicago and the career ending knee injury he suffered in New Orleans. And Zach's candid conversation about coming off the painkillers after this brutal injury.

programme.title: The Kelly Osbourne and Jeff Beacher Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Kelly Osbourne & Jeff Beacher Podcast. Best friends Kelly Osbourne and Jeff Beacher sit down to talk about their lives after Kelly's recently revealed sobriety relapse. Celebrity life coach Mike Bayer joins the pair on their inaugural show to dive into the sources of our addiction, the vices that drive them, and gives Kelly & Jeff ways to move toward a path of healing. Subscribe and listen to new episodes released every Tuesday on Apple Podcast and wherever you get your podcasts.

programme.title: The Most Dangerous Year
programme.desc: As a dark wave of anti-transgender bathroom bills began sweeping across the nation, The Human Rights Campaign called 2016 the most dangerous year ever for transgender Americans. Filmmaker Vlada Knowlton captured the ensuing civil rights battle from the perspective of a group of embattled parents including herself and her husband, parents of a young trans girl -- fighting to protect their children from discriminatory laws in their home state. While Knowlton passionately follows the story of anti-transgender legislation, the heart of the film lies in the stories of the families who accept and support their kids for exactly who they are.

programme.title: I'm From Driftwood
programme.desc: Being Queer In The Country/Defying What's Blackness, What's Femininity And What's Masculinity/Drag Culture Really Does Have A Place In Society/Football, Family And Coming Out/I Am A UFO Child That Was Left Here By Mistake/I Had To Ditch The Trans Narrative And Finally Start Writing My Own/I Promised Myself I Would Never Bully Again/Ian McKellen Would Be Proud Of Me/I'm Black, Jewish, But Guess What? I'm Also Gay/ I'm Christian But I'm Also A Very Out Lesbian S1 E11-20 | Rachel grew up in a small West Virginia town. After living in other larger cities she learns the importance of letting &amp;quot;country queers&amp;quot; know that it's okay to stay in rural towns. One group of people told Icon to &amp;quot;act like a man.&amp;quot; Another group told him to &amp;quot;femme it up&amp;quot; and to be a &amp;quot;big black girl&amp;quot; and to &amp;quot;snap, snap, snap and be sassy.&amp;quot; Icon decided to ignore them all and just be Icon. When Vincent Cooper first saw a drag queen, he was physically repulsed. Over the years, he learned to not only embrace them but view them as an important part of society. Robbie comes out to his mom in the middle of her beloved Seattle Seahawks football game. And some things just have to wait till commercial. Cecilia Gentili's brother told her she was an alien. Being transgender, she thought it might be true. After watching &amp;quot;Priscilla Queen of the Desert&amp;quot;, Kathryn Gonzales learned what &amp;quot;transgender&amp;quot; meant. After attempting unsuccessfully to transition five times, Kathryn had an epiphany at a stop light and finally found her own path. After making derogatory comments about a gay classmate, Joseph's friend tells him something that changes him forever. When Adam Sandel first moved to San Francisco, he had the pleasure of interviewing out and proud actor Sir Ian McKellen, who gave Adam some advice that changed his life.Jason Daniel Fair has a white, Jewish mother and a black, Christian dad. His dad gave him advice as a child that helped him embrace his differences and shaped who he is as a gay man. Crystal Cheatham was told by her church that she had the voice, an incredible gift of playing the guitar, the ability to lead a band, to write music, and to mentor children. But all that meant nothing to them because she's a &amp;quot;practicing homosexual.&amp;quot;

programme.title: Kumu Hina
programme.desc: Imagine a world where a little boy can grow up to be the woman of his dreams, and a young girl can rise to become a leader among men. Welcome to Kumu Hina's Hawai'i. Kumu Hina tells the inspiring story of Hina Wong-Kalu, a transgender native Hawaiian teacher, or kumu, who brings to life Hawaii's traditional embrace of mahu - those who embody both male and female spirit. Produced by Emmy-winning directors Dean Hamer and Joe Wilson in association with ITVS and Pacifc Islanders in Communications, the film traces Hina's evolution from Collin Wong, a timid high school boy, to her present position as a married woman and cultural director of a school in one of Honolulu's grittier neighborhoods. When Hoonani, a charismatic 6th grade girl, asks to join the school's all-male hula troupe, Kumu Hina gives her the opportunity to express her inner male spirit. As teacher and student prepare for a climactic end-of-year public performance, they meet many obstacles, but hold fast to the idea that being true to oneself matters most.

programme.title: Tiny Laughs
programme.desc: When a queer Latina architect meets a struggling Asian comic at an improv class, their instant sparks sends them on a humorous and heartwarming journey through the city of dreams.

programme.title: Putting On

programme.title: The Q Agenda
programme.desc: S3 E2 | In this edition of The Q Agenda, we catch up with the quarantined Rafael De La Fuente of the CW's Dynasty. Plus, host Jason Carter breaks news from RuPaul's Drag Race and we discuss the FDA's ban on blood donations from gay people.

programme.title: My Trans Life
programme.desc: Being trans is a mental, physical and emotional journey and MY TRANS LIFE showcases inspiring trans individuals on their journeys of acceptance.From preparing for major surgery, to tackling love lives, to campaigning for equality, MY TRANS LIFE follows transgender people facing the world in the body they were meant to be in.

programme.title: Voguing The Message
programme.desc: A pre-Madonna primer that raises questions about race, sex and subcultural style, Voguing: The Message traces the roots of this gay Black and Latino dance form, which appropriates and plays with poses and images from mainstream fashion.

programme.title: Barbelle
programme.desc: S1 E1-3 | Alice and Veronica attempt to tell band manager Karen that they've broken up - as a band and a couple. They quickly learn that breaking up is not an option. Alice and Veronica start work on their second album. Band manager Karen introduces a new collaborator: the former CB3 child star turned pop starlet Lulu St. Claire. Axis Records executive Richard shows up to hear Alice and Veronica's progress on their new album. Alice takes a step forward with Lulu.

programme.title: Barbelle
programme.desc: S1 E4-6 | Alice and Veronica prepare for a live interview. Veronica is shocked by a discovery. Veronica and Alice shoot a music video with an eccentric French Canadian music video director. Alice and Veronica crash Lulu's ultra lame birthday party replete with pop, chips, and weird uncles. Lulu attempts to keep her budding romance with Alice a secret from her religious parents while Veronica gets up to her usual disruptive antics.

programme.title: The Kinsey Sicks: Almost Infamous
programme.desc: The Kinsey Sicks are back with their show on the road to Vegas or Bust. This time Americas Favorite Dragapella Group are out to prove that theyve got the biggest busts and bigger voices in the City of Sin.

programme.title: The Library
programme.desc: As we seek to honor and celebrate the countless LGBTQ individuals, communities, sub-communities, and dynasties that have flourished in the face of adversity over decades, it dawned on us that there are so many unknown and untold stories about gay history, vocabulary, vernacular, and the human experiences that fuel the formation of cultures and identities based on authentic self-expression and love. As we discovered these stories, we wished for a gay library where anyone could visit and learn, in bite-size portions, about crucial events in gay history, gay heroes and icons past and present, fascinating sub-cultures, slang terms, scientific references, political movements... Essentially, a record of all the bits of queer education that are at risk of being lost or misinterpreted information that we all crave as members of LGBTQ communities and as Allies. Do you know the story of the first Pride parade? Ever wondered what Skoliosexual, Polycule, or Doppelbanger means? The Library is open and ready to clue you in.

programme.title: Smothered
programme.desc: S1 E1-7 | Jason Stuart (The Birth Of A Nation) and Mitch Hara (Mutant Olive) have co-written, starred &amp; produced their own series &amp;quot;Smothered&amp;quot;. They are harnessing their unique talents, baggage and humanness to express their joint insanity. This black comedy shines a glaring light on Randy (Hara) &amp; Ralph (Stuart), a longtime gay couple who cannot stand each other... but cant afford to get divorced.

programme.title: Voguing The Message

programme.title: The Most Dangerous Year
programme.desc: As a dark wave of anti-transgender bathroom bills began sweeping across the nation, The Human Rights Campaign called 2016 the most dangerous year ever for transgender Americans. Filmmaker Vlada Knowlton captured the ensuing civil rights battle from the perspective of a group of embattled parents including herself and her husband, parents of a young trans girl -- fighting to protect their children from discriminatory laws in their home state. While Knowlton passionately follows the story of anti-transgender legislation, the heart of the film lies in the stories of the families who accept and support their kids for exactly who they are.

programme.title: Engaged

programme.title: Dating My Mother

But when she reveals shes seeing another man, their version of domestic bliss comes crashing down. DATING MY MOTHER follows the intimate and tumultuous relationship between a single mother and her gay son as they navigate the dizzying world of online dating. While they search for their versions of Mr. Right, mother and son discover that sometimes you need to be apart in order to grow together.

programme.title: Animal Rescue
programme.desc: Just about everybody likes animals and doesn't like to see animals who are sick, injured or abused. So "Animal Rescue," a weekly series -- aimed at children and families -- that showcases spectacular rescues of animals, should be very popular. Because people don't like to see an animal's situation get so bad that it requires rescue, the program tries to avoid those situations by instructing children on the proper care of animals, as well as giving safety tips on caring for all types of creatures.

programme.title: America's Heartland
programme.desc: Much of the food Americans eat is produced by farmers and ranchers in the country's heartland, but many people don't know how it's produced. "America's Heartland" provides information about the people and processes responsible for the availability of food and fuel across the country and around the world. The show's reporters and producers tell stories in topics that include farm families, consumer issues, animal welfare and crop sustainability. Some episodes also take the show abroad to countries such as Egypt and Taiwan to show the impact American agriculture has on the global economy.

programme.title: Dog Tales
programme.desc: Dogs are said to be man's best friend so is it a surprise that there's a weekly show dedicated to dogs and the people who love them? That's what "Dog Tales" is all about. The show, aimed at teenagers, features information on dogs of all shapes, sizes and breeds while also informing young people on how to properly care for pets. It also provides safety, health and training tips that are useful for different breeds of dogs as well as emphasizing responsible pet ownership and compassion for all living creatures.

Plus, the walled city of Mdina then Valletta Gozo, The Blue Grotto, St. Pauls Catacombs, and the Temple of Hagar Qim. Finally, Laura rounds out her trip with an excursion to Ggantia, the oldest free-standing structure in the world.

Historical cannons had the huge advantage of being made from metal and using black powder as a propellant, surely Jrg and Cheyenne's machine won't even come close to the real thing?

programme.title: Inside Oranje U21

programme.title: Full Circle

programme.title: Full Circle
programme.desc: Richie Jackson explores how skateboarding has evolved over time, from sidewalk surfers to longboard dancers; to explore vert, street and longboarding, Richie meets Eduoard Damestoy, Spencer Semian, Josh Neuman and Hyojoo Ko.

programme.title: Full Circle
programme.desc: Richie Jackson dives into the rich world of skateboard culture to find out how its influence stretches far and wide, including tattoo artists Chloe Bernard, photographer Grant Brittain and musician Waxx Gyver.

programme.title: Full Circle
programme.desc: Richie Jackson knows a thing or two about board graphics, and now he's looking to update his own; he meets up with Jack Smith, Marc McKee, Marcos Cabrera, Joan Tarrago and Liane Plant to the world of skate art.

programme.title: Full Circle
programme.desc: As long as skateboarders skateboard, they film it; Richie Jackson explores the world of global content creators Spencer Barton and Truman Burbank, and also reveals his very own creative process.

programme.title: Full Circle
programme.desc: Skateboarding is an Olympic discipline, and that affect the status of the sport; Richie Jackson meets Aurlien Giraud, Douwe Macare and Candy Jacobs to find out what it takes to become an Olympic champion.

programme.title: Full Circle
programme.desc: Richie Jackson spends time with Mat Chigwidden in Camp Woodward in Australia and with Titus Dittmann, the founder of Skate-Aid, in Europe to find out how skateboarding can be used to inspire the younger generation.

programme.title: Full Circle
programme.desc: Richie Jackson researches skateboarding history by spending time with the legends who made it; his journey highlights the best in skateboarding history, from Jack Smith and Mike McGill to Steve Olsen and June Saito.

programme.title: Full Circle
programme.desc: Richie Jackson meets with Titus Dittmann, Julius Dittmann, Nils Gebbers and Salman Agah to learn that there is more than one type of money to be made in skateboarding.

programme.title: Pearl Jam - Let's Play Two
programme.desc: Let's Play Two is a documentary film that chronicles Pearl Jam's performances at Wrigley Field during the Chicago Cubs 2016 season. With Chicago being a hometown to Eddie Vedder, Pearl Jam's relationship with the city, the Cubs and Wrigley Field is unparalleled in the world of sports and music.

programme.title: Linkin Park - Linkin Park: Live in LA
programme.desc: Linkin Park perform their hit songs to an appreciative crowd in Los Angeles, California.

programme.title: Paul McCartney - A Musicares Tribute
programme.desc: The unmistakable Paul McCartney was honored as Person of the Year by MusicCares at a gala event that brought together several artists to celebrate the Beatles' victorious career.

programme.title: Prophets of Rage - Eurockennes 2018
programme.desc: Prophets of Rage live concert at Les Eurockennes 2018.

programme.title: Steve Aoki - Steve Aoki
programme.desc: Never one to stand still, Steve Aoki embarked on several new ventures in 2019. Amid an intense run of gigs, Aoki worked on the fourth volume of his Neon Future series of albums. Enjoy his show at Nameless Music Festival 2019!

programme.title: Tokio Hotel - Trabendo Session 2007
programme.desc: Watch Tokio Hotel's live performance in this Trabendo Session, from 2007!

programme.title: Interpool - Live at L'Olympia
programme.desc: Heavy sound and dim lighting set the mood for Interpol's impressive 2015 set at l'Olympia, in Paris. The American rock band from New York bring their post-punk and indie sounds to an appreciative crowd.

programme.title: Kylie Minogue - Live in London
programme.desc: Two hours of classic Kylie, capturing the energy, grandeur and extravagance of the massively acclaimed Aphrodite: Les Folies tour. Filmed at Kylie's triumphant O2 Arena show in London, this concert film was produced using a hi-tech multi-camera.

programme.title: Norah Jones: iTunes Festival: Live in London
programme.desc: Featuring unforgettable versions of her hits: 'Don't Know Why', 'Sunrise', and many more.

programme.title: Justin Timberlake - iTunes Festival: Live at Roundhouse, London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Justin Timberlake featuring unforgettable version of his hits: "Sexyback", "Cry Me a River", "Suit and tie" & more.

programme.title: Guns N' Roses - Live From The O2 Arena London
programme.desc: Watch this mega-production of Guns N' Roses performing live at the O2 Arena to its fans singing and vibrating to each song. Includes; Paradise City, Sweet Child O' Mine, November Rain and many more.

programme.title: Metallica - Master of Puppets
programme.desc: Master of Puppets is the third studio album released by American thrash metal / heavy metal band Metallica, released March 3, 1986.

programme.title: Slash - Live at The Sydney Entertainment Centre
programme.desc: The guitar legend Slash, frontman Myles Kennedy and their band The Conspirators played a blistering show at the Sydney Entertainment Centre. The searing set featured 'Sweet Child O' Mine', 'Paradise City' and 'Nightrain.'

programme.title: Eagles of Death Metal - Live at Eurockeennes 2015
programme.desc: Watch the hard-rock driven intense performance of Eagles of Death Metal live at Eurockeennes 2015.

programme.title: Shania: Still the One Live From Vegas
programme.desc: Performances from the singer's Las Vegas show; behind-the-scenes footage of the work that goes into creating a unique experience for the audience.
